name: MotivatePT
slogan: Mobile personal training across UK for corporates and individuals
description: Mobile personal training for individuals and corporates: Train Anywhere, Anytime. No Excuses.

team.name: Harkirat Garcha
team.bioHtml: Founder @MotivatePT • Worked at @WPP Group, @Grey Advertising / G2

jobs.title: Client and Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
We are looking for a driven and entrepreneurial individual to join MotivatePT at a very exciting time, as we grow the business and brand. You should love people, and discussing all things fitness. You will be helping our clients transform their lives through fitness, and you will be speaking with our team of trainers on a daily basis so organisation and resilience is key.

About MotivatePT
MotivatePT is on the hunt for an intelligent, self-starter to come on board and work with a growing and fun fitness company focused on becoming London's leading personal training brand. We work with a young, fun and dynamic team of trainers across London and the surrounding counties. We believe we have some of the most talented London personal trainers on our team and our services are for both individuals who want at-home personal training, and corporates who need to improve and better their corporate wellness schemes for their employees.

We are looking to make a full time hire at the end of the probationary period.

Your Involvement
You will work directly with the company’s founders, so will be exposed to different elements of the business from day one.
You MUST have previous sales and/or telephone experience and be confident to speak with our clients on the topic of fitness and make bookings. You should be target-driven and excited to grow with the brand through our marketing efforts.

The Role
Duties will involve but not be solely limited to the below:
* Liaising with new and existing clients as a sales manager to book their appointments
* Liaising with our team of trainers on a daily basis to ensure client onboarding is smooth
* Gathering client reviews
* Helping onboard new trainers to the team
* Managing social media content provided by trainers
* Management of daily social media platforms and posts
* Blogging for the website and for article contributions to other sites on the topic of fitness, health, and wellness
* Greater client & community engagement through 2x monthly newsletters
* Ad hoc projects as they arise
* Closing new business

Benefits
* Flexible working, work from home over time
* Free fitness classes
* Come to work in your workout gear
* Endless coffee, tea, and snacks
* Socials held weekly and monthly
* Non-corporate, fun co-working environment in Central London
* Work your way up into a more senior position quickly, the sky is the limit!

Necessary Skills
* Great written communication skills
* Good telephone manner
* Passionate about social media platforms and knowledge of how to grow and manage them
* Quick thinking and able to creatively find solutions
* Photography skills with both an iPhone and a camera
* Great sense of humour
* Resilient and able to think clearly in a crisis
* Photoshop & film editing
* Sales experience
* London based

jobs.title: Social Media Expert
jobs.description:
MotivatePT are on the hunt for an intelligent, self-starter to come on board and work with a growing and fun fitness company, focused on becoming the UK’s leading personal training brand. This candidate must have an exceptional working knowledge of all social media platforms and have a creative and visual outlook. 

Our intern will work directly with the company’s owners, so will understand what it takes to run a fitness company, and will be give access to all areas of the business from day one. 

We have big ambitions, and we don’t want to limit our intern’s involvement in the growth of the company, so the responsibilities include, but are not limited to, the below. 

The Role
•	Manage, regularly update and create brand consistency across all of our social media accounts - Instagram/Twitter/Facebook & Pinterest
•	Gather social media content by liaising with our team of personal trainers on a regular basis to capture their interactions with our clients. Create exercise and cooking vlogs for our website and guest posts 
•	Write fitness related blogs for our website (optional)
•	Help us to create great partnerships in the sports and fitness industry, so we can increase our offerings to our trainers and to our clients
•	Gather surveys and feedback from our database of clients
jobs.descriptionHtml:
MotivatePT are on the hunt for an intelligent, self-starter to come on board and work with a growing and fun fitness company, focused on becoming the UK’s leading personal training brand. This candidate must have an exceptional working knowledge of all social media platforms and have a creative and visual outlook.

Our intern will work directly with the company’s owners, so will understand what it takes to run a fitness company, and will be give access to all areas of the business from day one.

We have big ambitions, and we don’t want to limit our intern’s involvement in the growth of the company, so the responsibilities include, but are not limited to, the below.

The Role
• Manage, regularly update and create brand consistency across all of our social media accounts - Instagram/Twitter/Facebook & Pinterest
• Gather social media content by liaising with our team of personal trainers on a regular basis to capture their interactions with our clients. Create exercise and cooking vlogs for our website and guest posts
• Write fitness related blogs for our website (optional)
• Help us to create great partnerships in the sports and fitness industry, so we can increase our offerings to our trainers and to our clients
• Gather surveys and feedback from our database of clients
